all_concepts: High pressure digital level switch for CO2 and high-pressure applications
Specifically designed for modern eco-friendly refrigeration systems
Robust design for extreme mechanical and thermal stress
CO2 refrigerant compatibility in subcritical and transcritical cycles
Advanced safety features for reliable operation
High pressure range and temperature limits
Main application: standard systems requiring practicality
Robustness and versatility for high-pressure circuits
Significant Practicality of a Standard DIN Industrial Connector
LC-PS Functionality with the Convenience of an Industrial Connector
Digital Level Switch for High-Pressure Applications
Robustness and Praticity in High-Efficiency Systems
technical_specs: The standard, reliable and economical solution for level control.
Its design is the result of engineering aimed at substance and durability;
The excellent cost-effectiveness makes it the preferred choice for equipment manufacturers (OEM) and for large-scale installations
High-pressure version of the LC-PS model
Meeting the growing demands of modern eco-friendly refrigeration systems
The LC-PH is a high-pressure digital level switch, specifically engineered to meet the growing demands of modern eco-friendly refrigeration systems.

Its ability to withstand operating pressures up to 120 bar derives from superior structural design, which includes a reinforced machine body and materials selected to resist extreme mechanical and thermal stress.
Our LC-PH model boasts a robust design that can withstand pressures up to 120 bar.
The LC-PH offers multiple connectivity options, including a standard cable and M12 connector for secure and rapid connections.
Essential component to ensure safety and performance
This combination of robustness and versatility makes it an essential component to ensure safety and performance in high-pressure circuits
The LC-XT model is the pragmatic answer to the needs of installers and maintainers working on standard refrigeration systems
The LC-XT represents the perfect blend of robustness and practicability, making it an ideal solution for high-efficiency systems.
This digital level switch is designed to excel in demanding environments, combining a high-pressure range with the convenience of a DIN connector.

iconic_quotes: The standard, reliable and economical solution for level control.
Its design is the result of engineering aimed at substance and durability;
The excellent cost-effectiveness makes it the preferred choice for equipment manufacturers (OEM) and for large-scale installations

qa_pairs.question: What is the maximum pressure that LC-PS can handle?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PS is designed to operate with maximum reliability under pressure conditions up to 46 bar.

qa_pairs.question: How does LC-PS ensure accurate level detection?
qa_pairs.answer: Il principio di funzionamento si basa su una tecnologia collaudata che assicura una risposta precisa al variare del livello del fluido.

qa_pairs.question: Is LC-PS compatible with ATEX certification?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, LC-PS is ATEX certified, ensuring high safety and reliability.

qa_pairs.question: Can I use MODBUS protocol with LC-PS?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, LC-PS is compatible with MODBUS RTU protocol, enabling efficient communication.

qa_pairs.question: How do I install and wire LC-PS?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PS può essere installato e collegato in base alle specifiche richieste di applicazione, ma è importante seguire le linee guida del produttore per garantire una sicurezza e un'efficienza ottimali.

qa_pairs.question: What refrigerants is LC-PS compatible with?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PS è compatibile con una vasta gamma di refrigeranti, tra cui R134a, R404A e CO2.

qa_pairs.question: Can I use LC-PS in applications with high temperatures?
qa_pairs.answer: Sì, LC-PS può essere utilizzato in applicazioni con temperature elevate, ma è importante verificare le specifiche richieste di applicazione per garantire una sicurezza e un'efficienza ottimali.

qa_pairs.question: How does LC-PS ensure a reliable and secure operation?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-PS è progettato per garantire una sicurezza e un'affidabilità elevate grazie alla sua tecnologia collaudata e alla sua compatibilità con standard di sicurezza come ATEX.

natural_questions: Qual è la pressione massima che LC-PS può gestire?
Come LC-PS garantisce un livello di risoluzione preciso?

file_metadata.summary: LC-PS è una soluzione affidabile e economica per il controllo di livello in sistemi di refrigerazione standard.
